Lord of Karhold05278qanocrj70uj9o2h648ul4c3tc7lua4f894622013-05-27T15:26:03ZTargaryenBlood5239707'''Lord of Karhold''' is a title in the world of ''[[Game of Thrones]]''. The title is held by [[Rickard Karstark]] until he is beheaded by [[King in the North]] [[Robb Stark]] under charges of treason.<ref>[[Kissed by Fire]]</ref>

The holder rules the castle [[Karhold]] and its surrounding lands, a heavy forested area overlooking the [[Shivering Sea]]. The title is traditionally held by a member of [[House Karstark]]. Karhold lies in [[the North]] and therefore swears fealty to [[House Stark|the Starks of Winterfell]].
